The Dean is in-the-know about all of the exciting cultural happenings in and around the hotel. Whether it’s a karaoke night at The Boombox, an arts event or a screening of the latest film, our team keep tabs on what’s going on in Providence and we are happy to share. Come out with The Dean tonight!
